Reviews.Title: Good device
Reviews.Author: Anatori Shisaks "biblophile"
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that with this device I have two phone lines from 2 different companies on the 1 machine. One disadvantage of this model is the small size of the keypad buttons. For persons with fat or non-slender fingers this can be a challenge as well as the fact that small keypad means that it is difficult for older persons to read.  Perhaps not the best device for those who wish to have all the bells and whistles. However for the price I think that this machine is very good and certainly worth getting for those who wish to have a modern device while not spending a fortune on telecommunication devices.

Reviews.Title: For being duos I'm so happy and no comment
Reviews.Author: Jose Pucuta
Reviews.Content: The most importance of my choice it's that it work on both network within my country. My daughters are so happy to receive them as gift.

Reviews.Title: Good condition
Reviews.Author: Hauwa
Reviews.Content: Prompt delivery and good packaging. With respect to the phone, it is quite ok and does the basic things a phone should be able to do.

Reviews.Title: small phone for travel
Reviews.Author: Maria T. Correa
Reviews.Content: If not interested in Internet use or email, then it is a little phone to travel.  I find it expensive for what it does.I had to buy another one in the Miami airport, $19 one because the sim card for the US would not work on the phone.

Reviews.Title: love my Samsung CH@T Dual SIM
Reviews.Author: verlie deleon
Reviews.Content: I made an excellent choice purchasing this phone. Have not had any problems with it since i bought it. Both sim cards work very well. All features are working as expected. Purchasing this phone is a good buy for your money. Oh the red is very nice and the size is bigger than i thought..

Reviews.Title: Good for a tween
Reviews.Author: Terri Trotter
Reviews.Content: my daughter likes the phone.  Seems to have all she needs since I don't want her to have a data package.

Reviews.Title: Good seller fast shipment
Reviews.Author: Jose Barrios
Reviews.Content: Exactly what i wanted.This is what i hope to get when i purchased this item and the shipment was super fast

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung CH@T E2222 Red Dual SIM Unlocked GSM QuadBand Bar Cell Phone
